Attribute.Value: Communicate with ADS1115 analog-to-digital converter over I2C bus
Attribute.Name: Description

Signal.Description: Voltage difference between A0 and GND
Signal.Name: A0

Signal.Description: Voltage difference between A1 and GND
Signal.Name: A1

Signal.Description: Voltage difference between A2 and GND
Signal.Name: A2

Signal.Description: Voltage difference between A3 and GND
Signal.Name: A3

Signal.Description: Voltage difference between A0 and A1
Signal.Name: A0A1

Signal.Description: Voltage difference between A0 and A3
Signal.Name: A0A3

Signal.Description: Voltage difference between A1 and A3
Signal.Name: A1A3

Signal.Description: Voltage difference between A2 and A3
Signal.Name: A2A3

Element.Description: Filename of the adapter. Adapters are located at /dev/ (e.g. /dev/i2c-1). Note: One can run i2cdetect -l to get the list of available adapterss.
Element.Name: Adapter

Element.Description: Programmable gain amplifier. In no event should more than VDD + 0.3V be applied to this device.
Element.Name: Gain

Element.Description: Enables reading input into A0 signal. Disable to improve performance
Element.Name: EnableA0

Element.Description: Enables reading input into A1 signal. Disable to improve performance
Element.Name: EnableA1

Element.Description: Enables reading input into A2 signal. Disable to improve performance
Element.Name: EnableA2

Element.Description: Enables reading input into A3 signal. Disable to improve performance
Element.Name: EnableA3

Element.Description: Enables reading input into A0A1 signal. Disable to improve performance
Element.Name: EnableA0A1

Element.Description: Enables reading input into A0A3 signal. Disable to improve performance
Element.Name: EnableA0A3

Element.Description: Enables reading input into A1A3 signal. Disable to improve performance
Element.Name: EnableA1A3

Element.Description: Enables reading input into A2A3 signal. Disable to improve performance
Element.Name: EnableA2A3
